---
title: "otlp.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines configuration settings for metrics in a system. It specifically configures the metrics to use the OpenTelemetry Protocol (OTLP) exporter with custom endpoint and header settings.

## Symbols

### `metrics`
#### Description
The root configuration object for metrics-related settings.

#### Internal Logic
- Enables metrics collection
- Specifies the exporter type as OTLP
- Provides detailed configuration for the OTLP exporter

### `metrics.enabled`
#### Description
A boolean flag to enable or disable metrics collection.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| enabled | boolean | Determines if metrics collection is active |

### `metrics.exporter`
#### Description
Specifies the type of exporter to be used for metrics.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| exporter | string | The name of the exporter, set to "otlp" in this case |

### `metrics.otlp`
#### Description
Contains configuration specific to the OTLP exporter.

#### Internal Logic
- Defines the endpoint for sending metrics data
- Specifies custom headers for authentication or other purposes

### `metrics.otlp.endpoint`
#### Description
The URL endpoint where metrics data will be sent using the OTLP protocol.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| endpoint | string | The URL of the OTLP receiver, set to "http://localhost:9999" |

### `metrics.otlp.headers`
#### Description
Custom headers to be sent with each request to the OTLP endpoint.

#### Internal Logic
- Defines an API key for authentication or identification purposes

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| api-key | string | The API key value, set to "test-key" |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| metrics.enabled | boolean | true | Enables or disables metrics collection |
| metrics.exporter | string | "otlp" | Specifies the exporter type for metrics |
| metrics.otlp.endpoint | string | "http://localhost:9999" | The endpoint URL for the OTLP exporter |
| metrics.otlp.headers.api-key | string | "test-key" | The API key for authenticating with the OTLP endpoint |

This configuration file is likely part of a larger system that uses OpenTelemetry for metrics collection and export. It sets up the OTLP exporter to send metrics to a local endpoint (possibly for testing or development purposes) and includes a test API key for authentication.
